item.title: About
item.description: Hello there, I am Yogini Patel and I’m a Computer Engineer Student majoring in Nanoscale System Design at the University of Alberta. I have always been passionate about computers, software programming and technology as a whole. The thrill of building something I envisioned in my mind and watching it work is something Iâ€™ve always been a fan of. Recently I have been interested in Machine Learning and have been taking out time daily to broaden my knowledge about machine learning and data science.
